experience.organizationDesc: Silicon Valley VC funded seed-stage EdTech start-up
aboutWork: Setting strategy and leading dev team of 6 for platform for class taking, streaming, marketing; building personalized learning algorithms

Building 100+ REST API and web app of 3k+ DAU (keo.plus) with Angular and Node.js for fast iteration and coherent coding practices; storing data in MongoDB for flexibility and scalability; streamlining testing with Google Cloud Run and Cypress

Deploying with Kubernetes, Alibaba Cloud, and Docker; managing file storage, routing, load balance, domain name, infrastructure with Alibaba Cloud; distributing content with AWS; establishing product management protocols and managing Agile practices with Git, Jira
Led engineering of a drug name Optical Character Recognition-Named Entity Recognition AI API in collaboration with Tencent AI Lab

Helped manage a health WeChat miniprogram (80k users): optimized business intelligence time performance by 99.8% with Python and Selenium, worked cross-functionally to facilitate design and delivery of complex, multi-disciplinary features, assisted senior strategy

experience.organizationDesc: Global top 3 for intelligent robot vacuum
aboutWork: Built an automated CI/CD pipeline that processes 700k images weekly for customer-facing computer vision object detection AI models

Developed and integrated image rectification, intelligent filtering, object detection, inference verification, and relational database using Bash, Python, SQL, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Docker, Git; significantly accelerated and streamlined CNN model training and testing
Participated in paper reading and implementation of YOLO, SSD, MobileNet, Monodepth, Neural Architecture Search, FreeAnchor, etc.

Investigating deep learning based shape-from-silhouette 3D visual hull reconstruction; leveraging oriented projective geometry for self-supervision and neural networks for solving long-standing concavity and occlusion challenges (PyTorch); advised by Prof. Srinath Sridhar

research.organization: Brown Perception, Action, and Cognitio Lab
aboutWork: Examining generative models such as autoregressive transformers and their application in multimodal ML; advised by Prof. Chen Sun

research.organization: Brown Applied Math Directed Reading Program
aboutWork: Analyzed and implemented Physics-Informed Neural Networks (deep NNs that encode physical laws) with TensorFlow and matplotlib to solve problems involving differential equations (inference relative error <0.3%); worked with Enrui Zhang under Prof. George Karniadakis

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

Math.awardDetail: 2020 Mathematical Contest in Modeling Meritorious Winner (top 8%)
Brown Mathematical Contest in Modeling 1st Place
